filmography.title: Major Barbara
filmography.role_description: A devoted Salvation Army worker in this adaptation of George Bernard Shaw's play; an early British role.
filmography.plot: A wealthy munitions manufacturer donates to the Salvation Army, causing a moral crisis for his daughter, a Major in the organization.

filmography.title: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
filmography.role: Edith Hunter / Barbara Wynne / Johnny Cannon
filmography.role_description: A tour-de-force triple role playing three different women who define the life and loves of the protagonist across decades.
filmography.plot: An aging British military officer looks back on his life and career, realizing how the world and warfare have changed around him.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Perfect Strangers
filmography.role_description: A mousy housewife who joins the WRNS during WWII and transforms into a confident, glamorous woman.
filmography.plot: A dull married couple are separated by the war; both undergo profound changes and dread their reunion, fearing they are now strangers.

filmography.title: I See a Dark Stranger
filmography.role_description: A fiery Irish woman with a hatred for the British who inadvertently gets involved with a German Nazi spy.
filmography.plot: An Irish woman who hates the English decides to join the IRA but ends up becoming a pawn for a German spy.

filmography.title: Black Narcissus
filmography.role_description: A young Mother Superior attempting to establish a convent in the Himalayas while battling the environment and her own repressed emotions.
filmography.plot: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

filmography.title: Edward, My Son
filmography.role_description: The suffering, alcoholic wife of a ruthless tycoon; the role that earned Kerr her first Academy Award nomination.
filmography.plot: A man ruthlessly climbs the ladder of success to provide a luxurious life for his son, destroying his wife in the process.

filmography.title: King Solomon's Mines
filmography.role_description: A spirited Englishwoman who hires a guide to lead her into the unknown African interior to find her missing husband.
filmography.plot: Adventurer Allan Quatermain guides a woman and her brother into the unexplored heart of Africa to find her missing husband and a legendary diamond mine.

filmography.title: Quo Vadis
filmography.role_description: A devout Christian hostage in Rome who becomes the object of a Roman commander's affection during the reign of Nero.
filmography.plot: A Roman commander falls in love with a Christian hostage as Emperor Nero burns Rome and blames the Christians.

filmography.title: The Prisoner of Zenda
filmography.role_description: The royal cousin and betrothed of the King, who falls in love with his lookalike imposter.
filmography.plot: An Englishman who looks exactly like the King of Ruritania must impersonate the monarch when he is kidnapped by his ambitious half-brother.

filmography.title: Julius Caesar
filmography.role_description: The devoted and concerned wife of Brutus, who sees the toll the conspiracy is taking on her husband.
filmography.plot: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar leads a group of Roman senators to plot his assassination.

filmography.title: From Here to Eternity
filmography.role_description: A frustrated army wife who engages in a passionate affair with a sergeant on the beach, shattering her 'prim' screen image.
filmography.plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing in his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

filmography.title: The End of the Affair
filmography.role_description: A woman caught in a spiritual and romantic struggle between her lover, her husband, and God during WWII London.
filmography.plot: In war-torn London, a writer begins a passionate affair with the wife of a civil servant, but she abruptly ends it after a bombing.

filmography.title: The King and I
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed British widow who becomes the governess to the children of the King of Siam, challenging his traditions.
filmography.plot: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children, leading to a clash of wills and culture.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Musical/Comedy)

filmography.title: Tea and Sympathy
filmography.role_description: The compassionate wife of a housemaster who helps a sensitive student struggling with questions about his masculinity.
filmography.plot: A sensitive teenager is bullied at his boarding school for not being 'manly' enough, finding solace with the housemaster's wife.

filmography.title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
filmography.role_description: A nun stranded on a Japanese-occupied island in the Pacific with a rough Marine, forming a unique bond of survival.
filmography.plot: A Marine and a nun form an unlikely friendship when they are stranded on an island in the Pacific during World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; NYFCC: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: An Affair to Remember
filmography.role_description: A former nightclub singer who falls for a playboy on a cruise, but is struck by tragedy before their planned reunion.
filmography.plot: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

filmography.title: Bonjour Tristesse
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated fashion designer whose relationship with a playboy is sabotaged by his jealous teenage daughter.
filmography.plot: A jealous teenage girl plots to end the romance between her playboy father and his serious new girlfriend.

filmography.title: Separate Tables
filmography.role_description: A shy, repressed spinster dominated by her cruel mother, who finds a connection with a disgraced Major.
filmography.plot: Several lonely people at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth, England find their lives intersecting.

filmography.title: The Journey
filmography.role_description: An Englishwoman trying to smuggle a freedom fighter out of Hungary during the 1956 Revolution.
filmography.plot: A group of Westerners tries to escape Hungary after the Soviet invasion of 1956, but are held up by a Russian major.

filmography.title: Beloved Infidel
filmography.role_description: The Hollywood gossip columnist who has a turbulent love affair with the writer F. Scott Fitzgerald.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between columnist Sheilah Graham and author F. Scott Fitzgerald during his final years in Hollywood.

filmography.title: The Sundowners
filmography.role_description: A resilient Australian sheep drover's wife who yearns for a settled home while following her nomadic husband.
filmography.plot: In 1920s Australia, a family of sheepherders drive a herd across the country, while the wife and son yearn for a permanent home.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; BAFTA: Nomination – Best British Actress

filmography.title: The Grass Is Greener
filmography.role_description: An English countess who engages in a flirtation with an American millionaire, sparking a comedic duel with her husband.
filmography.plot: A British Earl fights to save his marriage after an American millionaire falls for his wife.

filmography.title: The Innocents
filmography.role_description: A sexually repressed governess who becomes convinced that the children in her care are possessed by malevolent spirits.
filmography.plot: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

filmography.title: The Chalk Garden
filmography.role_description: A mysterious governess with a dark past who is hired to care for a disturbed teenager in a household of secrets.
filmography.plot: A governess with a mysterious past is hired to care for a disturbed teenager, helping to heal the dysfunctional family.

filmography.title: The Night of the Iguana
filmography.role_description: A gentle, destitute artist traveling with her grandfather who provides spiritual comfort to a defrocked priest.
filmography.plot: A defrocked Episcopal priest leads a busload of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with his demons.

filmography.title: Casino Royale
filmography.role_description: A SMERSH agent who poses as the widow of M to seduce James Bond in this satirical spy comedy.
filmography.plot: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

filmography.title: The Gypsy Moths
filmography.role_description: A frustrated Kansas housewife who has a brief, passionate affair with a skydiver passing through town.
filmography.plot: A team of skydivers visit a small town to perform a show, and their arrival disrupts the lives of the local residents.
